alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 1:31PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts at or above 100 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. Mainly to transportation, particularly along Wyoming Highway 28 over South Pass. Elevated to extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Gusts in the past hour have been observed at over 100 mph. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
